note.p: Education: Stuttgart; University of Tubingen; St Bartolomew's Hospital. PhD (1852, Tubingen), MD (1858,Tubingen), MA
Career: Assistant in the Zoological Department of the British Museum.
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series B 1914-1915 vol 88 pp xi-xxvi, plate, signed by W C M
References: A E Gunther, 'The Darwin Letters at Shrewsbury School' in NR 1975-6 vol 30 pp 25-43
Notes: Henry M Noad has signed the election certificate twice
